biotools.summary: Uses the structure of DNA binding domains (DBDs) to predict the corresponding binding sites on DNA. Queries can be specified by a PDB ID or the coordinates of a DNA-binding protein in PDB format.

bioschemas.name: DBD2BS
bioschemas.summary: Uses the structure of DNA binding domains (DBDs) to predict the corresponding binding sites on DNA. Queries can be specified by a PDB ID or the coordinates of a DNA-binding protein in PDB format.
